snippet.title: Hyper Empire - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Play a 4x game in 40 minutes... or less! We streamlined 4x strategy down to a game that captures the fun in a manageable play time. Lead your faction against escalating enemies and expand the reach of your empire. Multiple paths to victory allows for a variety of strategies. Build your empire.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3096370/Hyper_Empire/
